programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Hearing Impaired and Unstoppable
programme.desc: At only 21 years old, Isabelle Sander has overcome a lot in her young life with hearing loss. However, to prove to herself and others that a diagnosis doesn't define a person, she is on a mission to participate in nature and be active outdoors.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Chef Mom Throws Down Against Chef Dad in Kids Menu Match-Up
programme.desc: Food truck father Jimmy Longoria is up against munchy meal mother Helen Markatos. Can these chefs elevate the kids menu? Or will their dishes send them to time out?

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Birmingham Bars Embrace Blue Collar Roots and a Multicultural Present
programme.desc: Birmingham’s favorite bartenders take Kate on a world tour of cocktails with tropical tiki showstoppers, aromatic Middle Eastern flavors, blue-collar dive bar favorites, and Kate’s first and truest love – agave spirits.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Smoking Gun in a Rebellious Teen’s Devastating Disappearance
programme.desc: The disappearance of 16-year-old JaRay Wilson spawns rumors of human trafficking in her small town in 2012. Investigators find her body and the truth, after an unlikely informant provides new details.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Oddest Cases of Family on the Wrong Side of the Law
programme.desc: Siblings stealing money from a Girl Scout? A father-daughter burglary ring? In these unusual cases, family members find themselves in hot water with the justice system.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Oddest Cases of Family on the Wrong Side of the Law
programme.desc: Siblings stealing money from a Girl Scout? A father-daughter burglary ring? In these unusual cases, family members find themselves in hot water with the justice system.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Made by Hand in the Southside
programme.desc: Ed and Day try their hand at pottery and make pretzels in a 150 year old oven before toasting their day at Carson Street Deli & Craft Beer Bar in the Southside.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Scratch Bake Boss Takes on Sweet Potato Prince in Great Baltimore Bake- Off
programme.desc: Queen of Cupcakes Chef Sumayyah Bilal is up against Pound Cake King Tre-von Clark in this royal bake-off. Which chef will take the cake? And who will be burned by the competition?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: All's Fair in Love and War
programme.desc: You can feel the love on this week’s culinary showdown. Chef Amy Mehrtens, Executive Chef of Copper Vine, challenges long-time friend Chef Daren Porretto, Chef de Cuisine at Saint John. While these two go back years, when it comes to competition they’re pulling no punches.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Crazy Basketball Shot and Bringing Joy to Cancer Warriors
programme.desc: Justin and Ryan drum up joy at Hope Lodge, delighting the dedicated staff and energizing patients. In Greenville, locals try for cash during a basketball challenge. A resourceful couple's resilience is rewarded.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Activist Nyki Robinson Intros Angel to Baltimore's Most Impactful Changemakers
programme.desc: Angel partners with Black Girls Vote founder, Nyki Robinson, to celebrate Baltimore's brightest Black changemakers. They spotlight a mission-driven clothing brand, a celebrated restaurant, powerful art and an incredible urban farm.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Johnny Damon, Foodie Fashionisto, & Wedding Photog Dole Out Hot Havens
programme.desc: Tourists might love Orlando, but nobody loves it quite like our local experts. They’’ll show you where to satisfy your hunger with Biggie’s Bomb-Mi sandwich, watch someone else feed a gator, and eat from the garden of Eden.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Magical Elixirs & Beautiful Pictures in Alexandria, VA
programme.desc: Dare to try a chicken sandwich so spicy even the chef won't eat it. Cool off with a sweet treat at a historic corner ice cream shop. Enjoy monumental views from the Potomac River, and create your own Harry Potter potion.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Making Time for Fun
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All Around The Wait, What Happened World
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Chef Showdown at the Black Tie Dinner
programme.desc: This is the formal food frenzy you don't want to miss. Chefs Tyler Johnson and Ben Lefenfeld are getting bougie for this Black Tie Dinner challenge. Whose meal will win best dressed?

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Pittsburgh?: Food Trucks
programme.desc: Pittsburgh loves its food trucks. Get to know some of the owners and chefs braving the cold to bring warm treats to people all over the city.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: A Mother's Nightmare: The Desperate Search for Cupcake
programme.desc: Three-year-old Kamille McKinney, affectionately known as "Cupcake," is abducted while playing outside a relative's Birmingham home. The ensuing search unifies the city, as residents pray she will be found alive.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Always Remember Your Name
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A documentary of mistaken identity, hope, love, and the power of story by two Holocaust survivors.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Unexpected Eats with Midwest Flair
programme.desc: Uncover the Midwest's unexpected. From quirky to inventive flavor mash-ups like the bulgogi burger to the questionable sour cream & raisin pie, see how the area crafts some interesting but delightful culinary concoctions.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Iowa Athletes Embody Midwestern Grit
programme.desc: Whether it's a wrestling star training through grief, champion rollerskaters challenged on the world stage, or a cycling team pushing through obstacles, Iowans don't back down when the going gets tough.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Grisly Discovery on the Gulf Coast
programme.desc: When body parts wash ashore in the Gulf Coast over several days in 2012, investigators must identify the victim before they can find the killers. Even then, justice is elusive.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Step Up to the Plate in Dubuque, IA
programme.desc: Play ball and stay the night at the Field of Dreams movie site. Take the high road, or track, aboard a funicular railway, then go low when you explore local caverns. Fill up on mini donuts, and find your zen with kava.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: More Than A Feeling
programme.desc: Heart, soul and sauce overfloweth when Chef Linda Green (a.k.a. “The Yakamein Lady”) goes up against Chef Estrada from the House of Blues. When you’ve got two chefs who pack a plate with this much love, there are no losers.

programme.title: Julia Tries Everything
programme.sub-title: Julia Tries Krispy Kreme
programme.desc: Julia tries the most popular donuts from Krispy Kreme's new flagship store.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation: Webs + Pottery
programme.desc: An Omaha home pottery artist, and a spider web-catching jewelry maker in Boston.

programme.title: Grit of Greenwood
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Greenwood was a thriving Black district in Tulsa when, 100 years ago, it was destroyed in less than 24 hours.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: These days, cameras are everywhere. Those up to no good can run, but Big Brother is always watching.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation Challenge: Screenprinters Pull Paint with True Grit to Honor Old West
programme.desc: It’s time to saddle up as three Oklahoma natives pull themselves to victory creating original screen print deigns encapsulating the Old West. Do these makers have the true grit it takes to be Maker Nation Champion?

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Louisville is Blazing a New Bourbon Trail
programme.desc: Kate learns how to play a Germantown street game, gets up close and personal with handcrafted, hand-charred bourbon barrels, and learns to fall back in love with whiskey – and natural wine.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Missing in Milwaukee
programme.desc: A missing Milwaukee woman's family and her community push for answers about her disappearance. What authorities learn a week later sends shockwaves through the city.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Best Buds Become Culinary Competitors in Small Town Toss-Up
programme.desc: Long time chef friends Kisha Washington and Brian Hohl compete in this Smaltimore small plates challenge. Can these small town friends handle a big screen competition?

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.sub-title: West by Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: WGAL News 8 Chronicle: 75 Years of Service
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: For 75 years, WGAL has been part of the Susquehanna Valley. We're going to look back at some of the biggest stories, examine how the community has grown and changed, and look ahead to what's next.

programme.title: Ethan: The Miracle Dog
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Follow one dog's journey to recovery, a forever home and eventually, stardom.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.
